page.title: 04OLD HOUSING IN MALBOROUGH
page.content: In Malborough there are many old houses and cottages,such as the{School {House}which is 113 years old.The {School House}was built in middle Victorian times.The{Old Vicarage}is over a century old as well.It has been converted into an old peoples home.{New House Barn}is over a hundred years old because the main structure is an old barn which has been converted into a house.All along Lower Town there are many old cottages which are approaching or have passed the century, such as{Dairy Cottage , {Whitehall Cottage}and{The Hobbit}.The {Muffins Coffee Shop}is built on the site of an old cottage.All that remains of it are three old walls of the cottage.The rest is less than a year old(today's date is 1/4/1985).
